content_html: The first look poster for the film 'Paran' has been officially released. The film is written and directed by Deepak Prasad Acharya (Kaku). Along with the poster, it was announced that the movie will be released in theaters on October 30. The poster features the two main stars of the film, actor Mahesh Tripath

title: First Look and Release Date for 'Paran' Revealed
